ShortDescription.Value: Earn achievements even with mods enabled. Keeps achievement tracking on. Enjoy :)

Publish.LongDescription:
## Achievement Fixer Keeps the achievements active even when you have mods.
### How it works * Just keep it installed - no set up needed. * Re-enables achievements after any city is loaded or switched. * Replaces the in-game warning ("Achievements are disabled because of mods").
### Notes * Safe to remove any time; does not touch saves. * Remove any other "achievement" mods to avoid conflicts. * Prevents **future** misses by keeping the achievement flag `true`. Game doesn’t retroactively grant past progress. * Mod does not use Reflection or Harmony; safer and less likely to break with game updates.
### 11+ languages * English, Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, Italiano Italian * 日本語 Japanese, 한국어 Korean, 简体中文 Simplified Chinese, 繁體中文 Traditional Chinese * Polski Polish, Português Brazilian Portuguese * WIP: Tiếng Việt (Vietnamese)
### Support and Feedback * If the mod helps you, give it a Like :) * Report issues on Github link or Discord `Achievement Fixer` channel. * Also see the Forum link.
### Advanced tab - Past things done before installing the mod, the game will not suddenly give you the achievement. - You'll need to re-trigger the condition in-game again from scratch (Keep this mod installed, and just do same things again). Or use the mod's Advanced buttons (you met the condition before, you deserve it).
### Credits * RiverMochi - mod author * inspired by Wayzeware's old Achievement Enabler (defunct) * StarQ for all the technical help. * rcav8tr for method to find game localization keys. * yenyang for code review and technical support. * Necko1996 for testing * and the CS2 modding community for pointers and testing.
